properties.displayName: MCSB Baseline item LT-1 for Azure SQL

features.featureName: Microsoft Defender for Service / Product Offering
features.featureDescription: Service has an offering-specific Microsoft Defender solution to monitor and alert on security issues.
features.featureGuidance: Microsoft Defender for Azure SQL helps you discover and mitigate potential database vulnerabilities and alerts you to anomalous activities that may be an indication of a threat to your databases.

automatedPolicyAvailability.policyName: Azure Defender for SQL should be enabled for unprotected Azure SQL servers
automatedPolicyAvailability.policyDescription: Audit SQL servers without Advanced Data Security

automatedPolicyAvailability.policyName: Azure Defender for SQL should be enabled for unprotected SQL Managed Instances
automatedPolicyAvailability.policyDescription: Audit each SQL Managed Instance without advanced data security.

automatedPolicyAvailability.policyName: Azure Defender for Azure SQL Database servers should be enabled
automatedPolicyAvailability.policyDescription: Azure Defender for SQL provides functionality for surfacing and mitigating potential database vulnerabilities, detecting anomalous activities that could indicate threats to SQL databases, and discovering and classifying sensitive data.

automatedPolicyAvailability.policyName: Azure Defender for SQL servers on machines should be enabled
automatedPolicyAvailability.policyDescription: Azure Defender for SQL provides functionality for surfacing and mitigating potential database vulnerabilities, detecting anomalous activities that could indicate threats to SQL databases, and discovering and classifying sensitive data.
